page.title: 19RECREATION _ Children
page.content: {YOUTH CLUB}On Wednesday evening in Essendon village hall Youth Club is held between 7pm and 9pm.You have to be ten years old to join.It costs 20p to get in and 30p for visitors.There are sweets and drinks on sale and music is playing on a music centre that plays tapes and records.We have 2 video games,3 snooker tables and 2 table tennis boards.There are also games,cards and darts. { {OTHER PLACES FOR CHILDREN TO PLAY {SWINGS _}by the school grounds. {CRICKET FIELD _}many events held here. {WOODS _}behind the cricket field _ good for making camps. {THE SPINNEY _}we make dams and camps. {RIVER LEA _ }good for swimming, fish- ing, tree climbing and rope swinging into the water.
